patthana13.3:5.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:5.2: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:5.3: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:5.4: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:5.5: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:6.2: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:6.4: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:6.5: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:7.2: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:7.4: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:7.5: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:8.1: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:8.2: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:8.3: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:8.4: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:8.5: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:9.1: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:9.2: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.3:9.3: Vipākadhammadhammañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko ca navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana13.3:10.1: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.3:11.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.3:13.1: Vipākañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.3:14.1: Hetuyā tevīsa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa … pe … purejāte āsevane nava … pe … vipāke pañca … pe … avigate tevīsa.
patthana13.3:15.2: Naadhipatiyā tevīsa … pe … nakamme cha, navipāke ekādasa, naāhāre naindriye tīṇi, najhāne cha, namagge pannarasa … pe … navippayutte nava … pe … novigate pannarasa.
patthana13.3:19.1: Vipāko dhammo navipākassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.3:19.4: Vipāko dhammo navipākadhammadhammassa ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.3:19.5: Vipāko dhammo navipākassa ca navipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana13.3:20.1: Vipāko dhammo navipākassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.3:20.4: Vipāko dhammo navipākassa ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.3:20.5: Vipāko dhammo navipākadhammadhammassa ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.3:20.6: Vipāko dhammo navipākassa ca navipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #6
patthana13.3:21.4: Vipākadhammadhammo navipākassa ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.3:21.5: Vipākadhammadhammo navipākadhammadhammassa ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.3:21.6: Vipākadhammadhammo navipākassa ca navipākadhammadhammassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #6
patthana13.3:22.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … pe … cha.
patthana13.3:23.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare soḷasa … pe … sahajāte tevīsa, aññamaññe terasa, nissaye chabbīsa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte cha, pacchājāte nava, āsevane cha, kamme cuddasa, vipāke pañca, āhāre terasa, indriye aṭṭhārasa, jhāne magge terasa, sampayutte nava … pe … vippayutte dvādasa … pe … avigate chabbīsa.
